channel.title: Comments on: Podcast 5: Would you marry unbelievers?

item.title: By: Jim Butler
item.dc:creator: Jim Butler
item.description:
Thank you for this. I agree with Dr. Waldron. I do wonder though, if it is a creation ordinance and not a church ordinance (again, I agree with this), couldn't a case be made for sending the subjects to an agent of the state to marry them instead?
I think Jay Adams argues against marrying unbelievers.
jim
